verses.verse: Israel <S%H3478><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in Shittim; <S%H7851><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> with the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%>

for they called <S%H7121><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their gods; <S%H430><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> ate, <S%H398><s%> and bowed down <S%H7812><s%> to their gods. <S%H430><s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> joined <S%H6775><s%> himself to Baal <S%H1187><s%> Peor: <S%H639><s%> and the anger of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> all the chiefs <S%H7218><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and hang them up <S%H3363><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> that the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> may turn away <S%H7725><s%> from Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the judges <S%H8199><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> kill <S%H2026><s%> his men <S%H582><s%> who have joined <S%H6775><s%> themselves to Baal Peor. <S%H1187><s%>"

Behold, <S%H376><s%> one of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and brought <S%H7126><s%> to his brothers <S%H251><s%> a Midianite woman <S%H4084><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> while they were weeping <S%H1058><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

When Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H6965><s%> he rose up from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> a spear <S%H7420><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%>

and he went <S%H935><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> into the pavilion, <S%H6898><s%> and thrust <S%H1856><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them through, <S%H376><s%> the man of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the woman <S%H802><s%> through <S%H413><s%> her body. <S%H6897><s%> So the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed <S%H6113><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Those who died <S%H4191><s%> by the plague <S%H4046><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

"Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> has turned <S%H7725><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> in that he was jealous <S%H7065><s%> with my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, <S%H3615><s%> so that I didn't consume the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in my jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>
Therefore say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'Behold, I give to him my covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace: <S%H7965><s%>

and it shall be to him, <S%H2233><s%> and to his seed after <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H1285><s%> the covenant of an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> priesthood; <S%H3550><s%> because <S%H834><s%> he was jealous <S%H7065><s%> for his God, <S%H430><s%> and made atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>'"

Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of the man of Israel <S%H376><s%> that was slain, <S%H5221><s%> who was slain <S%H5221><s%> with the Midianite woman, <S%H4084><s%> was Zimri, <S%H2174><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Salu, <S%H5543><s%> a prince <S%H5387><s%> of a fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%> among the Simeonites. <S%H8099><s%>

The name <S%H8034><s%> of the Midianite <S%H4084><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> who was slain <S%H5221><s%> was Cozbi, <S%H3579><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zur; <S%H6698><s%> he was head <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H523><s%> of a fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%> in Midian. <S%H4080><s%>

for they harassed <S%H6887><s%> you with their wiles, <S%H5231><s%> with which they have deceived <S%H5230><s%> you in the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Peor, <S%H6465><s%> and in the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Cozbi, <S%H3579><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of the prince <S%H5387><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> their sister, <S%H269><s%> who was slain <S%H5221><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the plague <S%H4046><s%> in the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Peor. <S%H6465><s%>"
